request.content: I am at the airport, and my bag has been derouted. Can I obtain a reimbursement?
I am traveling with my family, and all our bags were stolen from our rented car. Will the insurance reimburse the value of what was stolen?
My precious handbag was stolen while I was in a bar in Paris, along with my mobile phone and documents. Can you help me with the costs I’ll have to bear?

responses.response_outcome_justification: Costs of losing: expenses that the losing party is ordered to reimburse the victorious party

request.content: I had dinner at the resort yesterday, and I had an awful night with stomach pain and diarrhea. I want to see a doctor—can you send one to our hotel?
My daughter had a bike accident and needs to see a doctor. We are in Amsterdam—should we advance the hospital payment?

responses.response_outcome_justification: The insurance is valid in the country where the Insured suffered the accident

request.content: My daughter had a bike accident and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo—will the insurance cover the costs upfront?

responses.response_outcome_justification: The insurance is valid in the country where the Insured suffered the accident

responses.response_outcome_justification: The insurance is valid in the country where the Insured suffered the accident

n the event of a delay of the insured flight (identified by ETKT), which lasts more than 4 hours with respect to the arrival time stipulated in the flight plan and resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured against the amount shown on the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy
